mapper.select: select a.func_id funcId,f.func_url funcUrl,f.is_menu isMenu,f.func_name funcName,f.parent_id parentId,a.role_id roleId,f.type from t_sys_authorization a left join t_func_list f on f.id =a.func_id where f.is_del=1 and a.is_del=1 order by f.parent_id asc,f.sort desc
select id,func_id funcId,role_id roleId from t_sys_authorization where is_del=1 and role_id=#{roleId}
